Character Submittals:

Name: Koga Shuko 
Gender: Male
Beast Mode: Komodo Dragon
Side: N/A - Working for his personal agenda

Character History:

Koga Shuko, that's not his real name, is one of the richest Predacons on 
Cybertron.  Owner of Shuko International and PredTech Labs, he is one of the 
most influential Cybertronians ever in their 12 million year history.  
Getting the name Koga Shuko from Japanese history (Koga Shuko being a 
powerful Japanese warlord), he thinks of himself as a warlord, crippling all 
other business.  After investing in gestalt technology with a regular 
business partner, Set, the Oblitercons destroyed one of his most valuable 
labs, costing him several million (since no name has ever been given for the 
Cybertronian monetary unit, I will not put one in).  After sending a commando 
team to hunt them down, he got a report their ship crashed.  Forming a group 
with Set, he set off for Earth.  During the flight, the ship was hit by 
asteroids composed of unscannable metals, causing the ship to crash on Earth. 
 Now Shuko sets out to fufill his destiny.

Character Personality:

Koga Shuko thinks things through.  If something isn't for his benefit in one 
way or another, he won't do it.  Merciless, but can be merciful when it is to 
his benefit, Shuko will not show pity.  He doesn't care for any of his men.  
In his mind, everyone except himself is expendable.

Character Stats:

Function: Corporation Leader/Leader/Warrior/Scientist

Strength: 8.5
Intelligence: 10.0
Speed: 5.0
Endurance: 9.2
Rank: 1.0 
Firepower: 8.6
Skill: 10.0+

Beast Mode Description:

Koga Shuko's beast mode is a large Komodo Dragon.  With teeth that can pierce 
steel, this mode weighs over a ton, easily enabling Koga Shuko to pin his 
enemies and claw them to death.  His scales act as a super-srong armor, and 
his tail is like a deadly club, able to smash through a 20 ft thick tree 
trunk.

Robot Mode Description:

With a superbly armored red and black body, Koga Shuko is a menacing sight.  
With an energon blade in a scabbard around his waist, and a laser rifle in 
his right hand.  His optics a bright emerald, a face plate where his mouth 
would be.  In subspace he possesses a plasma rifle, gattling gun, missile 
launcher, and a set of charges.
